enableThreePhaseLoadBalancing.description: Enable dynamic load balancing on all three phases.

maximumReserveStateOfCharge.description: Maximum percentage of state of charge to keep as emergency reserves.

maximumStateOfCharge.description: Operational upper bound on the battery state of charge

minimumStateOfCharge.description: Operational lower bound on the battery state of charge

emsschema.description: Settings relevant to the operation of an IO energy solution

id.description: Unique id of the charger, collected from the `chargers` resource

jwt.description: Authentication token, collected from the `auth` resource

jwt.description: Authentication token, collected from the `auth` resource

evWallboxChargersRequest.description: Collect charger list from wallbox account

evWallboxChargersResponse.description: Collect charger info from a specific charger in an account

apiKey.description: API Key value assigned to the fleet

onboardPolicy.description: Onboarding policy assigned to the fleet

userId.description: Cognito identifier of the user assigned to the fleet

attention.description: Number of devices that require attention on the fleet

offline.description: Number of offline devices on the fleet

total.description: Number of devices on the fleet

stageKeys.description: A list of Stage resources that are associated with the ApiKey resource

fleetCertificateResponse.description: A base64 encoded zip file with the certificate files

fleetDeviceClaimRequest.description: Request to claim a device to a fleet

fleetDeviceClaimResponse.description: Successful response to a device claim

fleetGridDatum.description: A timeseries datum of fleet energy grid information

fleetHouseholdDatum.description: A timeseries datum of fleet household information

parentGroupName.description: Parent fleet name, this name will be appended to the created fleet

thingGroupName.description: Fleet name, must be unique within the same fleet

userId.description: User Id of owner of fleet
Unique ID of user assigned to fleet

thingGroupArn.description: Amazon Resource Name of created fleet

parentGroupName.description: Parent fleet name, this name will be appended to the created fleet

thingGroupName.description: Fleet name, must be unique within the same fleet

userId.description: User Id of owner of fleet

db.description: Database name to collect data from (deprecated?)

fleet.description: Name of the fleet to collect data from

table.description: table name to collect data from (deprecated?)

timeEnd.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) to end collection from

timeStart.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) to start collection from

Grid.description: Fleet grid information, each object key is a timestamp string inside which a grid datum object is stored

Household.description: Fleet household information, each object key is a timestamp string inside which a household datum object is stored

end.description: End date of the data as an ISO-8601 timestamp string

power.description: Forecasted or realized power in W. Positive is injection, negative is drawing.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp string of the datum in UTC

pool.description: Array of client EANs in the pool

start.description: Start date of the data as an ISO-8601 timestamp string

group_name.description: The forecasted or realized data points for the group named `group_name`, the key value will change dynamically

imbalanceResponse.description: Response to a succesfull imbalance forecast request

iotPolicyResponse.title: Successful response to an IoT policy update request. True if an update was required, false if no update was required

email.description: The email to link the device to

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to be used to collect a new JWT without having to use usernames and passwords

token.description: JWT token to be used to authenticate other requests in this API

backToken.description: Token to provide to move backwards in time on the pagination

eosb.description: Whether the backwards stream has reached an end

eosf.description: Whether the forwards stream has reached an end

forwardToken.description: Token to provide to move forwards in time in the pagination

logs.description: A list of stored logs for the provided `logName`

ingestionTime.description: A UNIX milliseconds timestamp representing the time the log was ingested in the cloud

message.description: A JSON serialized string with the contents of the log

timestamp.description: A UNIX milliseconds timestamp for the occurrence of the log

measschema.title: Lifepowr IO measurements object
measschema.description: Object for passing around measurements between operational code, cloud and EMS

name.description: The device display name to request

status.description: Integer of the status of the peripheral

peripheral-id.description: Object containing the status of the deleted peripheral

peripheralDeleteResponse.description: Response to a successful delete of a peripheral - contains the remaining state of peripherals of the type that were deleted

enabled.description: Indicates if the device is steered.

label.description: Label or name of the device.

maxAvailableCurrent.description: Maximum available current for the device.

maxChargingCurrent.description: Maximum charging current for the device.

endTime.description: End time of the charging schedule.

startTime.description: Start time of the charging schedule.

targetCurrent.description: Target current for the charging schedule.

type.description: Type of the device (e.g., 'ev' for electric vehicle charger).

failures.description: Object containing the status of succesfully set peripherals

enabled.description: Whether the peripheral is steered or not

maxChargingCurrent.description: Maximum charging current the peripheral is willing to use

maximumElectricityPrice.description: Maximum electricity price the peripheral is willing to pay

status.description: Integer of the status of the peripheral

mode.description: Energy management mode of the peripheral

schedules.description: List of schedules for the peripheral

strategy.description: Custom energy strategy of the peripheral

peripheral-id.description: Object containing the status of set peripheral

success.description: Object containing the status of succesfully set peripherals

peripherals-type.description: Object containing the status of the set peripherals

peripheralsSetResponse.description: Response to a successful set of peripherals

url.description: URL to download requested release (valid for 60s)

ev.description: The cost of charging EVs using FlexIO

evOnly.description: The cost of charging EVs without using solar or a smart battery

lifepowr.description: The cost of operating your home load under FlexIO

solar.description: The bill from using a solar instalation including charging a potential EV

solarSansevActualTariff.description: The bill from using a solar instalation excluding charging a potential EV with client's tariff

solarSansevVariableTariff.description: The bill from using a solar instalation excluding charging a potential EV while on variable tariff

solarTariff.description: The bill from using a solar instalation including charging a potential EV while on dynamic tariff

end.description: The Unix timestamp of the end of the period

health.description: The health of the measurement - percentage of time device was online and in normal mode

battery.description: Savings due to smart battery steering

ev.description: Added value from controling EV charging under Flexio

lifepowr.description: Added value from using FlexIO (battery + dynamic)

solar.description: Added value from using only solar

tariff.description: Savings due to dynamic tariff steering

start.description: The Unix timestamp of the start of the period

aggregate.description: The aggregation of the periods. Valid values are 'd' (day), 'w' (week), 'mo' (month)

timestreamGetResponse.description: Object where each root key defines the available tables. For each root key an internal object is defined whose keys contain the available measurements and for each measurement a `dataType` object is assigned

aggregate.description: Type of aggregate data to collect. Remove this key if you wish to collect raw (2s granularity) data

db.description: Database to collect data from, should be set to `sampleDB`

measures.description: The list of measures to collect timeseries from

table.description: The table the measures should be collected from - list of tables should be retrieved from the GET request

timeEnd.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds defining the end of the timeseries query

timeStart.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds defining the start of the timeseries query

timestreamPostResponse.description: Object with timeseries information. Each root key contains a name of a measurement requested and each key contains an array of timeseries datum objects

refreshToken.description: Refresh token string. Used to refresh authentication if the token expires.

type.description: (Optional) The preferred type of user to test authorization. Only needs to be used in case the user has multiple types of users with the same email

username.description: Username string, should be the user's email

email_verified.description: String defining if the user's email is verified

fleets.description: Array of fleets the user is assigned to

Enabled.description: Wheter user is enabled or not

UserLastModifiedDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp depicting last edit time

role.description: Role of user. Can be `manager` or `owner`

value.error: A error occurred while processing the request.

calculatorErrorResponseBatInvMismatch.summary: Error response for battery and inverter mismatch

value.error: Battery and inverter must be both '0' or both non-zero

calculatorErrorResponseOutOfBounds.summary: Error response for out of bounds values

value.error:
Request out of bounds for battery_kwh, inverter_kw, pv_kwp.
 - battery_kwh = 1000.0, limits are [5, 25]
 - inverter_kw = 100.0, limits are [2.5, 10]
 - pv_kwp = 1000.0, limits are [0.1, 23]

calculatorErrorResponseRegionSegment.summary: Error response for unsupported region or segment

value.error: Region 'PT', segment 'residential' or combination of both is not yet supported.

fleetAllResponse.summary: Response for list of available fleets

fleetApiKeyResponse.summary: Response for request of API Key

fleetResponse.summary: Response for list of available fleets

imbalanceResponseForecast.summary: Response to a succesfull imbalance forecast request

imbalanceResponseRealized.summary: Response to a succesfull imbalance realized request

realTimeRequest.summary: realTime - Request device to trigger real time

realTimeResponse.summary: realTime - Response to a real time request
